      • assertCanWrite

        public void assertCanWrite​(User user)
        Assert the current user has write access to the given user
        Parameters:
        user - user the currentUser want to edit
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - bad request if user id null; authRequired if currentUser is not authenticated; forbidden if current user is authenticated but has not right to edit given user
